sdss.name: SDSS
sdss.description: Major spectroscopic survey creating detailed 3D maps of the universe

lsst.name: LSST
aliases: Legacy Survey of Space and Time
lsst.description: Wide-field survey telescope that will image the entire visible sky every few nights

lamost.name: LAMOST
aliases: Large Sky Area Multi-Object Fiber Spectroscopic Telescope
lamost.description: 4-meter telescope with 4000-fiber spectrograph for massive spectroscopic surveys

panstarrs.name: Pan-STARRS
aliases: Panoramic Survey Telescope and Rapid Response System
panstarrs.description: Wide-field survey telescopes discovering asteroids, supernovae, and variable stars

ztf.name: ZTF
ztf.description: High-cadence all-sky survey finding supernovae, asteroids, and transient events

ngts.name: NGTS
ngts.description: Array of 12 small telescopes hunting for transiting exoplanets

speculoos.name: SPECULOOS
aliases: Search for habitable Planets EClipsing ULtra-cOOl Stars
speculoos.description: Network of robotic telescopes searching for exoplanets around ultracool dwarfs

hat.name: HATNet
hat.description: Network of small automated telescopes discovering transiting exoplanets

wasp.name: SuperWASP
wasp.description: Two robotic observatories discovering transiting exoplanets

vst.name: VST
vst.description: 2.6-meter telescope designed for wide-field optical surveys

desi.name: DESI
desi.description: 5000-fiber spectrograph creating largest 3D map of universe, measuring 40 million galaxies

des.name: DES
des.description: Deep multi-band survey of southern sky studying dark energy through multiple probes

kids.name: KiDS
kids.description: Deep multi-band imaging survey for weak gravitational lensing and galaxy evolution

2mass.name: 2MASS
2mass.location: Mount Hopkins, Arizona and Cerro Tololo, Chile
2mass.description: All-sky near-infrared survey cataloging 300+ million stars and 1+ million galaxies

allwise.name: AllWISE
allwise.description: Combined WISE survey data covering entire sky in mid-infrared with enhanced depth

boss.name: BOSS
boss.description: SDSS-III program measuring spectra of 1.5 million galaxies for baryon acoustic oscillations

eboss.name: eBOSS
eboss.description: SDSS-IV program extending BOSS to map cosmic structure from 0.6 < z < 2.2

apogee.name: APOGEE
aliases: Apache Point Observatory Galactic Evolution Experiment
apogee.location: Apache Point Observatory and Las Campanas Observatory
apogee.description: High-resolution infrared spectroscopy of 100,000+ stars across the Milky Way

galah.name: GALAH
galah.description: High-resolution spectroscopic survey measuring chemical abundances of 1 million stars

rave.name: RAVE
rave.description: Medium-resolution spectroscopic survey of 500,000 stars for Galactic structure

cfhtls.name: CFHTLS
cfhtls.description: Deep multi-band imaging survey for weak lensing and high-redshift galaxies

cosmos.name: COSMOS
cosmos.description: Deep multi-wavelength survey of single field studying galaxy evolution to z~6

candels.name: CANDELS
aliases: Cosmic Assembly Near-infrared Deep Extragalactic Legacy Survey
candels.description: Largest HST survey studying galaxy evolution and reionisation at z > 1.5

goods.name: GOODS
goods.description: Ultra-deep multi-wavelength survey combining Hubble, Spitzer, Chandra, and others

hudf.name: HUDF
hudf.description: Deepest optical/NIR image ever taken, revealing ~10,000 galaxies to z~10

ukidss.name: UKIDSS
ukidss.description: Deepest and largest near-infrared survey of its time with multiple components

viking.name: VIKING
viking.description: Near-infrared complement to KiDS optical survey for photometric redshifts

video.name: VIDEO
video.description: Deep infrared survey reaching z~4 for galaxy evolution studies

vhs.name: VHS
vhs.description: Largest near-infrared survey covering entire southern sky to complement 2MASS

first.name: FIRST
aliases: Faint Images of the Radio Sky at Twenty-Centimeters
first.description: Radio survey cataloging ~1 million sources, studying AGN and radio galaxies

nvss.name: NVSS
nvss.description: Large-area radio survey cataloging ~2 million sources above -40° declination

vlass.name: VLASS
vlass.description: Modern all-sky radio survey with better resolution and sensitivity than NVSS/FIRST

racs.name: RACS
racs.description: Fast all-southern-sky radio survey cataloging ~3 million sources

emu.name: EMU
emu.survey_area: Full southern sky + part of north
emu.description: Deep radio continuum survey expected to detect ~70 million galaxies

lofartier1.name: LoTSS
lofartier1.description: Low-frequency radio survey mapping entire northern sky at unprecedented sensitivity

tgss.name: TGSS
tgss.description: Low-frequency radio survey covering sky north of -53° declination

wenss.name: WENSS
wenss.description: Low-frequency radio survey of northern sky at 325 MHz

gleam.name: GLEAM
aliases: GaLactic and Extragalactic All-sky MWA survey
gleam.description: Wide-band low-frequency survey with best spectral coverage at low frequencies

atlassurvey.name: ATLAS
atlassurvey.description: All-sky survey searching for near-Earth asteroids and discovering supernovae

asassn.name: ASAS-SN
asassn.description: Global network of robotic telescopes discovering supernovae and transients

gaia_dr3.name: Gaia DR3
gaia_dr3.description: Third data release with 1.8 billion stars, including spectra and stellar parameters

hipparcos_catalog.name: Hipparcos Catalogue
hipparcos_catalog.description: First high-precision astrometric catalog with 118,000 stars and milliarcsecond accuracy

skymapper.name: SkyMapper
skymapper.description: Digital all-sky survey of southern hemisphere for stellar populations and transients

4most.name: 4MOST
4most.description: Multi-fiber spectrograph for VISTA obtaining millions of spectra for multiple surveys

weave.name: WEAVE
weave.description: Multi-fiber spectrograph performing large spectroscopic surveys of Milky Way and beyond

moons.name: MOONS
aliases: Multi Object Optical and Near-infrared Spectrograph
moons.description: 1000-fiber spectrograph for VLT studying galaxy evolution and Galactic archaeology

unions.name: UNIONS
unions.description: Deep multi-band survey of northern sky combining ground and space observations

delve.name: DELVE
delve.description: Wide-area survey targeting Milky Way satellites, stellar streams, and local volume

jwstcosmos.name: COSMOS-Web
jwstcosmos.description: Largest JWST survey program mapping COSMOS field for high-z galaxies and AGN

jades.name: JADES
jades.description: Deep JWST spectroscopic survey studying first galaxies and galaxy assembly

ceers.name: CEERS
ceers.description: JWST early release science program studying galaxy evolution from z~10 to present

hsc_ssp.name: HSC-SSP
hsc_ssp.location: Hyper Suprime-Cam, Subaru Telescope, Mauna Kea, Hawaii
hsc_ssp.description: Deep, wide-field optical imaging survey with Hyper Suprime-Cam on Subaru for weak lensing, galaxy evolution, and transient science
